SELECT pt.point_cd , pt.user_id , pt.pay_cd , pt.point_amount , pt.point_event_date , pt.point_save_date , pt.point_end_date , pt.point_how_get , (case when l.lesson_nm IS NOT NULL then l.lesson_nm when s.facility_stadium_nm IS NOT NULL then s.facility_stadium_nm else fp.pass_nm end) AS goods_nm FROM point AS pt LEFT JOIN pay AS p ON pt.pay_cd = p.pay_cd LEFT JOIN goods_order AS g ON p.order_cd = g.order_cd LEFT JOIN lesson AS l ON l.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd LEFT JOIN facility_stadium AS s ON g.facility_goods_cd = s.facility_goods_cd LEFT JOIN facility_pass AS fp ON g.facility_goods_cd = fp.facility_goods_cd WHERE pt.user_id = #{userId};
pt.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM point WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (point_cd , user_id , pay_cd , point_amount , point_event_date , point_save_date , point_end_date , point_how_get) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('point_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(p.point_cd,'_',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1,2,0)) FROM point AS p) , #{userId} , #{payCd} , #{payPrice} , #{payRegDate} , #{payRegDate}+7 , #{payRegDate}+365 , 'N')
